name: Management System
description: An employee management system created with Java File I/O to keep track of the names, IDs, and wages of employees.

name: Recycling System
description: A recycling system developed in Python which is capable of classifying and disposing of containers using a Q-arm and Q-bot in Quanser Interactive Labs.

name: Currency Converter
description: A currency converter created using Java, JSON files, and an API system. An interactive UI/UX was developed using Java Swing.

name: Heart Pacemaker
description: A heart pacemaker capable of regulating a patient's heart rate using different configurations created with MATLAB Simulink and Python.

name: Spatial Mapping System
description: An embedded spatial mapping solution utilizing the VL53L1X Time-of-Flight sensor and ESP32 microcontroller to capture and visualize 3D environments.

name: Autononmous Vehicle System
description: A C++ and Python-based autonomous vehicle prototype featuring real-time camera sensing, object detection, and obstacle avoidance.

name: Self-Sustaining Intelligent Greenhouse (SSIG)
description: An AI-powered smart greenhouse system that monitors and controls temperature, pH, and moisture using sensor data and actuator automation. Built with ESP32, Flask, MySQL (AWS), and real-time cloud integration.

name: Restful Job Board
description: A full-stack web app for managing and viewing job listings, built with Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, and React. It features a RESTful API with Swagger docs, a clean frontend UI, and is fully containerized using Docker and Docker Compose.

name: Note Application
description: Developed a note taking app using Node.js (Express) REST API with MongoDB (Mongoose), styled using HTML/CSS and React JS (Vite).

name: Account-Customer Management System
description: Clean architecture Spring Boot app for customer and account lifecycles—repositories, services, controllers—powered by JPA and PostgreSQL.

name: Ride-Sharing/Delivery App
description: Simulates a ride-sharing and delivery platform. It uses Eureka for service discovery, a distance microservice, and a main app that manages users, trips, vehicles, and ratings.

name: Personal Portfolio
description: This portfolio uses React + TypeScript on the front end with custom CSS and Font Awesome for styling. Data for projects and experience is fetched via Axios from JSON files, which is managed through a local Spring Boot backend that updates those JSON files behind the scenes.
